page.title: 18Diary - Hilmarton School
page.content: {July 3rd.}Overseas students, on a course at Bradford University, visited the school during the afternoon. {July 9th.}An Open Evening held in school. {July 12th.}Children from Classes II and III went to the Savernake Forest for an Indian Pow-wow. { {July 12th - 14th. }Fifteen children went on a camping trip to a school near Weymouth. They visited Brownsea Island, Worbarrow Bay, Tyneham, Poole Park, Corfe Castle and Maiden Castle. {July 16th. }Sports Day was held on the school field with the parents present. {July 18th.} Class I visited Spye Park, near Devizes. {July 19th. }Mr Giles, a local beekeeper, brought a demonstration hive into school and spoke to the children about beekeeping. Today is the last day of Summer Term.
